text: Blixen can refer to the following, * Baron Bror von Blixen-Finecke, Swedish born African big game hunter, commonly known as Bror Blixen. * Carlos Blixen, Uruguayan basketball player, Olympic medalist in 1956 * Hans von Blixen- Finecke, (Bror's twin brother) and his son, Hans von Blixen-Finecke, Jr., both Olympic medal winners in equestrian events. * Hyalmar Blixen, Uruguayan writer * Karen Blixen, (Bror's wife) Danish born novelist. * 3318 Blixen a main belt asteroid, named after the novelist.
title: Blixen
